str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of krites; a rule of judging, i.e. a tribunal.
Belonging to ordinary life, worldly. From a derivative of bioo; relating to the present existence.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To set at naught, ignore, despise. A variation of exoudenoo and meaning the same.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
